Interrupts.Name: Shadow Slip
Interrupts.Effects: Gain evasion against that attack, then after the attack resolves, teleport to the space of a shadow clone and replace it, removing the clone and gaining stealth. This interrupt can be repeated as long as there is at least one shadow clone.

Actions.Name: Shadow Stab
Actions.Effects: Teleport 1 and gain stealth. If made from stealth, can dash 2 before and after the action.

Actions.Name: Shadow Clone
Actions.Description: Summon a shadow clone in a free space in range 3.

Summons.Name: Shadow Clone
Summons.SummonEffects: Foes adjacent to a shadow clone at the start of their turn take [fray] damage from the clone.
